hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Water Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #time#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Stone of Agony#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Small Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Ice Cavern#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Song of Time#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
